tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Implant / RCT,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Fillings,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Very professional, friendly and compassionate has been Dr Deepa's approach towards every patient. Very efficient and effective in our every appointment. She has become the go to doctor to my entire joint family for every kind of dental treatment. I strongly recommend Dr Deepa to anyone.

Dr Deepadnya is very patients and explains the problem well before starting any procedure. She handles all her patients personally and never hurries or rushes through. The clinic is well maintained and has several visiting specialists for complex procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My tooth extraction procedure was very easy going... Although I was scared but Dr. Deepa made me relaxed and comfortable and was explaining each and every little things and also communicating with me to distract me from my fear...She was also very sweet and I am satisfied with my visit there..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
The treatment was for my mother, for her upper teeth. Deepa explained the possible options with dentures, screws  and helped us choose that suited our requirements. She is always patient n explains well..
My mother is very happy with the output and she is keen to get the lower denture as well after 6 months of using the upper denture. 
I would highly recommend Deepa for all sorts of dental treatments ..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Understand the problem and treat accordingly has good knowledge in explaining the patient. Waiting period is also less communicating and explaining is good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Deepadnya Helekar was very polite and friendly. She explained the existing condition very aptly. She helped me understand the possible line of treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
